GamblingWheelSettings.name: bigwheelgame.forcedbigwheelhittype
GamblingWheelSettings.description: Forces the Gambling Wheel to land on the chosen colour: Yellow = '0', Green = '1', Blue = '2', Purple = '3', Red = '4', Random = '-1'.

GamblingWheelSettings.name: bigwheelgame.spinfrequencyseconds
GamblingWheelSettings.description: Defines how often the Gambling Wheel spins. Lower is faster. (Int is a whole number)
